GENERAL.friends.request.receive.de-DE:
[grey]Du hast eine Freundschaftsanfrage von [blue][player] erhalten!
[ANNEHMEN] - [ABLEHNEN]
GENERAL.friends.request.receive.en-US:
[grey]You have received a friend request from [blue][player]!
[ACCEPT] - [DENY]

GENERAL.friends.request.send.en-US: [grey]You have sent a friend request to [blue][player]!</color></color>

GENERAL.friends.remove.en-US: [grey]You have removed [blue][player]</color> from your friends list!</color>

GENERAL.friends.remove.other.de-DE: [grey][blue][player]</color> hat dich aus seiner Freundesliste entfernt!</color>
GENERAL.friends.remove.other.en-US: [grey][blue][player]</color> has removed you from his friendlist!</color>

GENERAL.friend.request.revoke.other.en-US: [grey][blue][player]</color> has revoked the [blue]friend request</color> to you!</color>

GENERAL.friends.join.online.en-US: [grey]There are currently [green][friends-online]</color> of your friends online! <dark_grey>([green][friends-online]</color> / [grey][friends]</color>)</dark_grey></color>

GENERAL.friends.join.offline.en-US: [grey]There are currently [red]none</color> of your friends online!</color>

ERROR.friends.request.notsent.de-DE: [grey]Du hast [blue][player]</color> <color:#ff0000>keine</color> [blue]Freundschaftsanfrage</color> gesendet, die du zurückziehen könntest!</color>
ERROR.friends.request.notsent.en-US: [grey]You have <color:#ff0000>not</color> sent a [blue]friend request</color> to [blue][player] that you could revoke!</color>

ERROR.friends.request.receive.de-DE: [grey][blue][player]</color> hat dir <color:#ff0000>keine</color> [blue]Freundschaftsanfrage</color> gesendet, die du annehmen könntest!</color>
ERROR.friends.request.receive.en-US: [grey][blue][player]</color> has <color:#ff0000>not</color> sent you a [blue]friend request</color> that you could accept!</color>

GENERAL.setting.notify.join.enable.de-DE: [grey]Du wirst nun [blue]benachrichtigt</color>, wenn ein [blue]Freund</color> den Server [green]betritt!</color></color>
GENERAL.setting.notify.join.enable.en-US: [grey]You will now be [blue]notified</color> when a [blue]friend</color> joins the [green]server!</color></color>

GENERAL.setting.notify.leave.enable.de-DE: [grey]Du wirst nun [blue]benachrichtigt</color>, wenn ein [blue]Freund</color> den Server [red]verlässt!</color></color>
